== RobTaylor ==

Rob Taylor is a Debian Gnome Team member. For a day job he does various Linux-shaped things at Cambridge Broadband Ltd. (http://www.cambridgebroadband.com) including an installation/test tool based of the Ubuntu live cd. He also makes use of OpenEmbedded (http://openembedded.org), and GPE(http://gpe.handhelds.org). He is interested in the efficent use of open source in business, and the economic/societal structures that arise in Open Source development.
